EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_Adopting SV State of Mind_Q316.Reminder 9-28-16
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Adopting the Silicon Valley State of Mind
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/adopting-the-silicon-valley-state-of-mind/london]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for tomorrow's Adopting the Silicon Valley State of Mind in London. See event details below:
Date: 29 September 2016 {{my.Save the Date:default=Save the Date!}} Time: 12h00 to 16h00 Location: Pivotal, The Warehouse, 211 Old Street, 2nd Floor, London EC1V 9NR Map & Directions
AGENDA <[[https://pivotal.io/event/adopting-the-silicon-valley-state-of-mind/london]]>
Getting to Reception Scaffolding obscures sightlines to The Warehouse from the Old Street Roundabout, but if you persevere through the building site, youâ€™ll find us!
Step-by-Step Directions
- Come out of Subway 4 from Old Street Tube Station - Walk up the ramp on your left - Immediately in front of you there is white boarding with "Ceviche" and "Maki" advertised, walk past this to the right into a mini courtyard - The revolving doors for our building are immediately on your left - Enter the building, walk down to your right past the coffee shop and you will find the elevators at the end; we are on the 2nd floor
Change in plans? If you are no longer able to attend the forum, please reply to this message to let us know so that your spot can be released to the waiting list.
We look forward to meeting you soon!
The Pivotal Team
Questions? Please contact Nick Holden at nholden@pivotal.io <[[mailto:nholden@pivotal.io]]> or Ines Schuller at ischuller@pivotal.io <[[mailto:ischuller@pivotal.io]]>.
